pageTitle: Travelling solo from the 30 of july to the 28 of august : Travelfish Companions travel forum
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {8863=Hello guys/girls my name is Daniel, Im a venezualan really excited about finally getting to thailand. Im arriving in BKK on july 30th. and leaving to phi phi until august 6th, then going to chiang mai on the very 6th, and from there to laos and find my way down to bangkok around the 20th to finish in koh samui or koh pagang for some days of relax! I have been in almost all america and europa, but this is my first time into Asia. Im been living the most part of my life in Barcelona, Spain, then spent some time in London and now installed in Paris. Im really keen to travel a lot this summer! but i know travelling with partners is always more funny. If anybody is going to be around those dates, please let me know and we can plan something together! Cheers, Dani, 6605=Joined Travelfish 17th July, 2012 Posts: 11, 5742=#3 Posted: 17/7/2012 - 22:24, 9032=Joined Travelfish 24th July, 2010 Posts: 1, 5446=Joined Travelfish 15th April, 2012 Posts: 8, 7391=Joined Travelfish 15th June, 2012 Posts: 3, 4713=#4 Posted: 24/7/2012 - 22:28, 6984=#2 Posted: 15/6/2012 - 18:32, 8007=#1 Posted: 24/7/2010 - 00:49, 5276=Hi Daniel I'm also a solo traveller and arriving into Bangkok on 29 July. My plan is to spend some time in Bangkok, then Chiang Mai and go on to Laos, Vietnam & Cambodia. I'm also a solo traveller and really looking forward to meeting new people! It'd be really great to meet new people - so if you're about - let me know / send me an e-mail on sima_lad@hotmail.com Sima (24-f-uk)}
